name: Waldorf Salad
ingredients: 3 large apples, unpeeled and diced, can use 1 Granny Smith, 1 Red Delicious apple, 1
Golden Delicious or Fuji or Brae burn
instructions: Combine mayo, sugar and lemon juice.
Mix in celery and nuts, Stir well.
Spoon over fruit mix and gently stir to combine.
Depending on the size of the apples, you may need to double the amount of dressing.
